name: Lucjan
one: As You can see, you have some action menu next to your sprite
This menu will only show if you are ready to attack
This is really important because after every action, You will need to wait some time to do another action
Different actions have different wait time
Your enemies will also need to wait to attack, now enemy timer is paused so you can learn, but it won't be so easy in real battle
Another important thing is, if enemy attacks you, when you're choosing your action, your action will be canceled, so you need to think fast
Also basic attacks have skill checks
Mele skill checks work really simple
Above your head direction arrows will appear
When this happens you need to click the button corresponding to movement direction same as an arrow shows
For example, when the arrow is pointing up you need to click [W]
Arrows can repeat itself so if you click correct button and arrow is still pointing in the same direction it means that it is another skill check, and you need to click the same button again
You also have time limit for this so you need to be fast
Right now lets try attacking an enemy
two: So now you attacked enemy with your current fighting style, which is melee at the start of every fight
Every character has two fighting styles, melee and range
You can switch between them during fights, but remember You will need to wait some time after click change style button
Attacks from different styles are dealing different damage and have different skill checks
Range skill check works a little bit different than the melee one
When you click attack crosshair will appear in random position on the screen
It will move to choosed enemy position
When the crosshair is on the enemy, you need to click [SPACEBAR]
If you miss you won't perform attack and you will need to wait same time as if you had attacked
Now lets try changing your fighting style to range, and attack the enemy again
three: So now you know how to attack enemies with basic attacks and change style
Now let's learn how to use skills
Skills are special abilities of a character
The important thing is, some skills are dedicated to specific fighting styles
So for example if your character has range type skill it won't be shown on the menu if you have melee fighting style set
Also some skills have different effects, for example your skill has an 'all' effect. It means it will work on all enemies, and it won't require a skill check
You can check all skills of a character in the menu
Your skill is range type, so you will be able to use it right now
four: Okay so if have this covered now let's learn how to use items
We have two kinds of items - healing and reviving
You can only use healing item on characters who are not knocked down
And reviving works only on teammates that are knocked down
Now let's try using red brew potion which master gave us
(If You select the wrong item or attack, You can press [Escape] to cancel the action.)
five: Now you hopefully know how to fight.
